original_text: both kidneys with the fat on them near the loins, and the long lobe of the liver, which is to be removed with the kidneys.
korean_text: 두 콩팥과 그 위의 기름 곧 허리 쪽에 있는 것과 간에 덮인 꺼풀을 콩팥과 함께 떼어내고

sentences.original_text: both kidneys with the fat on them
and the long lobe of the liver
which is to be removed with the kidneys
